actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit to small businesses for the costs of qualified health insurance.
short_title: Keeping Small Businesses Healthy Act of 2007

summary.text: Keeping Small Businesses Healthy Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small business employers (100 or fewer employees) a refundable tax credit for up to 60 percent of the health insurance costs paid for their employees.

titles.title: Keeping Small Businesses Healthy Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit to small businesses for the costs of qualified health insurance.
